summary: New Zealand immigration e-visa status checking website - a web application for users to check their visa application status by entering application details, similar to the official Immigration New Zealand portal
architectural_notes: Web-based application for visa status checking
User input form for application details (application number, passport details, etc.)
Status display system showing application progress
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- New Zealand flag icon or national emblem suitable for government portal header (nz-emblem.dim_120x120.png)
- Clean professional hero background with subtle patterns suggesting official government documentation (hero-bg.dim_1920x400.png)

existing_features.title: Build a visa status check form with input fields for application reference number, passport number, and date of birth with proper validation
Display visa application status results showing application reference, current status, application type, submission date, and last updated date in a clear, organized layout

Create a professional, government-style interface inspired by official immigration portals with clean typography, formal color scheme, and clear information hierarchy that conveys trustworthiness and official authenticity

new_feature_requests.summary: Visa status checking functionality with application detail input
Clean user interface for visa status portal

Create a backend actor that stores and retrieves visa application records with fields: application reference number, passport number, date of birth, application status (Received, In Progress, Approved, Declined), application type, submission date, and last updated date
Add backend function to seed sample visa applications for demonstration purposes including various statuses (Received, In Progress, Approved, Declined)
